shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Nov. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Daniel J. Santaniello, President and CEO of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce that Charles Hangen has joined Fidelity Bank as SVP, Chief Risk Officer.

shorts.description: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II (ACH Gen II) production contract (SPE1C1-23-D-0004) awarded to Gentex Corporation. Valued at up t…
shorts.content: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II (ACH Gen II) production contract (SPE1C1-23-D-0004) awarded to Gentex Corporation. Valued at up t…
shorts.content_distilled: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency  has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II  production contract  awarded to Gentex Corporation.

shorts.title: New park coming to Throop next year
shorts.title_distilled: New park coming to Throop next year.

shorts.title: Business in Jessup raises nearly $7K, collects 5,000 pounds of food for Feed A Friend
shorts.title_distilled: Business in Jessup raises nearly $7K, collects 5,000 pounds of food for Feed A Friend.
shorts.description: Dempsey Uniform and Linen Supply's friendly competition raised over 5,000 pounds of food and nearly $7,000 for WNEP's Feed A Friend campaign.

shorts.title: Residents say no, council votes yes in data center vote
shorts.title_distilled: Residents say no, council votes yes in data center vote.
shorts.description: ARCHBALD, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A contentious vote involving data centers drew dozens to a local borough council meeting on Monday in Lackawanna County. Residents say they feel their voices are not being heard and are demanding answers from the council. The topic of data centers is a sensitive one for many, especially in Archbald, [...]
shorts.content: ARCHBALD, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A contentious vote involving data centers drew dozens to a local borough council meeting on Monday in Lackawanna County. shorts.title: City of Scranton declares Code Blue for Thanksgiving, Black Friday
shorts.title_distilled: City of Scranton declares Code Blue for Thanksgiving, Black Friday.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Scranton officials announced on Monday that a Code Blue will be in place for Thanksgiving and Black Friday. The Lackawanna County Emergency Management Agency and the City of Scranton declared a Code Blue Frigid Weather Alert for Thursday, November 27, from 7:00 p.m. to 7:00 a.m. Friday, November 28, then [...]
shorts.content: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Scranton officials announced on Monday that a Code Blue will be in place for Thanksgiving and Black Friday. The Lackawanna County Emergency Management Agency and the City of Scranton declared a Code Blue Frigid Weather Alert for Thursday, November 27, from 7:00 p.m. to 7:00 a.m. Friday, November 28, then [...]
